name: Police Officer Crime Detective
description:
Do you take keen interest in investigating mysterious cases? Do you think that you can solve criminal cases and have detective touch in you? Then we offer you a perfect crime investigation game to fulfill your needs, so you can solve the mysterious crimes like bank robbery or the crime happened at the Mrs. Ellen house, find all the clues that will help you lead to the right culprit and you don’t arrest the innocent person. You might have played many crime solving games, but this detective game is mapped on in a real 3D environment.

Features:
Inspect the crime scene carefully.
Gather the proofs which help you to the culprit.
Solve the clues for a better prediction.
Use your common sense to get the real criminal.
